content.detailedDescription:
These events are reoccuring. the most recent was last night (5/26/10). the objects are white orbs. i know when the objects are in the sky by the sounds that you can hear inside my home. it is similar to a stationary jet, but not the same. it is a deeper rumble lasting for a longer period. when i first heard the noise about one year ago, i went outside to see what was making the noise i looked up and saw a oval circle of white orbs surrounding a larger red orb. the lights moved in a uniform pattern east to west at a consistant speed, not breaking the pattern.  i tried hard to explain what i was seeing as i looked at the lights.  at times i could hear a high pitch like a tuning instrument.  i live in a subdivision and all the dogs in the neighborhood were barking.  then soon the lights disperesed from the center red light and went in differnt directions.  they moved so quickly that they streaked across the sky.  the movements went on for a few minutes. the lights at times would blink and i could hear the tones at times. a little later i could hear what i knew was jets.  i saw three jets coming from east or south east across the sky.  when the jets approached, the lights seemed to drop from the sky as the jets flow by.  with in minutes of the jets leaving the area, the lights lifted back up and left up into the sky.

i still hear the rumbling and know that when i do that it is time to go outside and look into the sky.  the lights return and you can see the white lights and i can not explain what i see any better than i can then.  i have not seen the red orb again, but still see the white ones quite often.  often the jets will still show up and fly the area after the lights are in the sky.  sometimes there are a few of the lights sometimes several. the apperance always seems to set off the dogs in the neighborhood and the sound of the event is always present.  i am not saying this is anything from another world, but i would like to know what it is.  after the last event one of my dogs was so scared, she would not settle down and even stay in her room.  just a little creepy!
content.summary: Multiple orbs

content.detailedDescription:
I don't speak english well. so, my story is very short.

i sow a ufo 5pm46~8min. korea is spring now. sky is clean.
there was no cloud and no high-buildings.

i was in the bus on the roads. the bus was moving, and front of tunnelentrance.
the bus had clean windows.
suddenly, a small flash came into my sight to high-sky.
when i found the light, slowly fade away.
but there was something remained. 
that's shape was lie down baguette or bullet.
color was white.
there was continues until when i came out from tunnel.

the ufo didn't have any motion and sound.
content.summary: Flash and bullet of shapes ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Around 8:35pm on the evening of may 25, 2010, i noticed a small dark elliptical object at about 50��� altitude in the eastern sky. the object seemed to be slowly drifting easterly towards a compass heading of approximately 70���. i took one still picture before the object moved behind my house. 

after moving to another position, i began filming and reacquired sight of the object at approximately 8:40pm. at this time the object was approximately at 40��� altitude at a compass heading of 95���. the object appeared stationary for a brief time before reversing direction and heading westerly towards a compass heading of 290���.  the object seemed to increase speed as it moved. i tracked the object as it moved towards the zenith until it became obscured behind a tree���s leaves at 8:43pm. after moving to an area with a clearer view of the western sky, i failed to reacquire sight of the object.

i filmed the object on a dv camera at 10x optical zoom. the object was either very high or very small because it was hard to make out any details. 
no exhaust, lights, or sound were observed.

my brother viewed the object through 10x20 binoculars and describes the object as geometric, possibly diamond shaped. another brother viewing with his naked eyes describes the object as moving with a wobbling characteristic.
content.summary: Dark object observed over lemoyne, pa by 3 witnesses, captured on video.

content.detailedDescription:
I just got home. i was letting my dog out back,as i stepped outside i noticed a bright light rising in the distance. it at first i thought was a bottle rocket or something but it traveled a large part of the sky. but the light was not always visible. it like skimmed across the sky. appearing the disappearing reapearing in the distance. but an obvius path.
i struggled to define what i just saw. i stood there staring when i saw it again,or another one. same thing like a skimming light. i couldnt believe it. then it was like ther were multiple ones in different parts of the sky. i am willing to believe these are meteors at this point. although i dont know if its a meteoer shower or not. after a few minutes of nothing. one starts in the southern part of the sky and within seconds was in the extreme northern sky. then it seemed to turn at an exact 90 turn and head east until i could no longer see it. there was a consistincy to the pattern 3 flashes some distance later in the same line of path 3 more flashes. am i the only one who saw this?
content.summary: Unbelievable lights crossing the entire sky in seconds. lights almost skipping the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in my back yard having finished smoking a cigarette a few minutes before, and just enjoying the semi-cooler air from the hot-humid day. whenever i'm outside at night, i'll look up just to star gaze and sometimes track the movements of planes as they're always flying overhead from the many airports in the surrounding area. since i grew up in the area, i learned early on what a plane looked like overhead at almost any height. this was definitely not a plane. at first i noticed one that seemed to be flying from the north towards the southeast, and when i continued looking, i noticed a second that was south and a little further west of it. the two were moving in the exact same direction, even when they changed to due south, at the exact same speed. we watched for several moments as they continued to move south, staying bright orange, as they moved. then they started to blink, or flicker as the continued to go south. the blinking was at various rates, sometimes fast, sometimes slow. after several seconds of that they were just gone. there were no tails or streaking behind them to indicate a falling meteor or satellite, on top of they were moving much too slow to be that. it's a fairly cloudless night, and we could continue to see stars near where the orange lights were flickering. what has perplexed us (my girlfriend was there with me and saw them as well) was the slow, in time movement.
content.summary: Two orange dots over eastern pa.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my kitchen in front of the sliding glass doors which face west and overlook my yard which has a 20 foot maple tree in the middle of it and an adjacent farm field to the horizon. it was after dark and it was a vary cold night in february.  i was working on a stained glass art piece and i had the grinder running which is really loud, i had digital music on the television which was up even louder so i could hear it over the grinder.  all of a sudden i started hearing a loud deep humming sound over all the noise and the house seemed to be vibrating.  i looked out the slider and i saw, coming over the ridge in the farm field and heading right toward the house, something flying really low with two red lights, one in front and one in back and two flashing white lights also in front and back.  i freaked and thought holey s--- its my ufo moment.  i through off the safety glasses and tossed off my gloves and ran for the front door.  as i grabbed the knob i thought, but they're not supposed to have any sound, check and see if its a helicopter.  i opened the door and ran out on the deck and it was coming right over head.  it was about two and a half times as high as my tree, about 50 off the ground. first the front went over really slowly then the back.  it didn't sound like a helicopter there was no fluttering of propeller blades just a deep steady humm.  i didn't feel any wind either and looked around for signs of things moving but it was completely still no breeze at all.  i tried to make out a shape and that was the most frustrating thing about it because it was a new moon and i live out in the country and its pitch black and i just came out from a lighted house and the porch light was on. i couldn't see a shape but it felt cylindrical, don't ask me how i know thats just what i scened.  i looked for lights inside in case there was a cockpit or something but there weren't any just the single red and white lights in the front and back, the reds were on steady and the whites were flashing. i thought it was at least as long as my manufactured home, its a 16 ft wide by 80 ft long.  as the back light passed over the house i ran out to the end of the driveway and got a good estimate of the length about 80 to 100 feet long.  our lotts are 60 feet wide and it almost covered 2 lot withs.  

i didn't know what to think, still don't.  i've watched for helicopters and none have that light set up and they have a definite propeller sound.  i got a mailer in april saying that they were going to be spraying for gypsy moths and that plains were going to be flying right over the tree tops and that they were loud.  i called them and asked if they were doing any research fly overs in february at night.  they said that they never use helicopters and that they definitely wouldn't be flying at night.   

it didn't sound like a helicopter, it was a steady low pitched resonating humm, there was no wind movement at all and it was about 50 feet off the ground.  i got no clue what it was but if you know of any other reports of it, or what it might be, i'd love to know.

thanks,
lily
content.summary: Long object aprox 80 to 100 feet long flew over house aprox 60 feet off the ground.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home northbound on the 55 freeway in the city of orange, ca around 2 am. as i passed the collins overpass and before the katella overpass, i noticed what looked like a satellite traveling west across the sky very slowely. i literally said "huh, a ufo! lol" and chuckled a bit as it crossed the sky slowely. a few seconds later it stopped then started slowely traveling east towards the hills of orange/ irvine. suddenly, it stopped and took off like a shooting star, north (towards the cajon mountains) and faded away. a second after that, it came back bright blue, like really bright blue. as it reappeared, it seemed to be traveling towards me (south)slowely then started t otravel east. as i passed the collins overpass and started to exit onto ketalla, the light had already traveled to my right hand/ passenger side. as it continued to move slowely i lost it over the freeway fence (becasue of the height of the fence). the last sight i saw was a bright blue light shaped like a fat bone traveling east over the fence.I exited off to ketalla and made my first right onto a residential street, but lost the light. luckily i just so happend to have my camera next to me becasue i had taken it with me to the angels/ athletics game. i managed to snap two pictures but only one came out. i dont consider myself a skeptic, but seeing this object, which i strongly felt was a ufo,i stongly feel that ufos exist. seeing is believing. i have attached a photo of the object but it must be enhanced to truely see its form. the light is located in the left mid corner.Be sure to zoom in on the object to see what i saw that morning.
content.summary: Driving home in the morning i saw a bright blue light.

content.detailedDescription:
in 1975 september i was lying outside my mom and dads home searching the skies for any planets i could see with my dads bionoculars. there had been reports in the tacoma news tribune of alien ships being chased by usaf jets that were scrambled out of mccord afb. i was in hopes of seeing these and how unlucky i became.  if i had only known what would happen. i would have ran for my life and never look at the skies again.  
  while earnestly searching the skies, i noticed some lites like a small planet moving form east to west.  then another from west to east. and yet another from south to north.  all come close to each other.  infront of our house they were about 150 feet off the ground. they made no noise and they were shaped like a boomjerang with wings that sloped like the wings of a c-141 plane however these were no airplanes.  i became overjoyed and then began to use my lantern flashlite shuinning it at the ships while turniong it on and off a bunch of times.  then two ships began to leave one to the right and one to the left. then one just floated to above our house and stopped.  under the ship there were walkways with rails andthey were in a circle under but made to the craft then i noticed this small dome and i just starred at it and it was if a small window had opend and there was this being starring at me.  i waved to him and he waved back to me. thats when it hit me i became very scarred and ran inside the house.  where my mom was sewing at her sewing machine.  we had a big bay window where i yelled mom look help. run.... immediatly my mom looked at the craft and became wwhere she couldnt move but did lock the door. so i turned around and ran to the front door but before i could reach the door it began to open with a very intense light siloughting against the door while it was opening.  so i stopped and ran to the living room .  at this time my mom was already stiff as a board and floating towards the front door at about 3 feet off the ground.  at seeing this i ran as fast as i could to my bedroom. and hid in my closet. i pulled the clothes that were on hangers on top of me.  in hopes that they wouldnt see me.  but i was realloy trembling and then my closet door opend up i was so scarred that i felt like i was on fire.  but then rhis alien dressed in a black gown with this little guy with very big eyes touched my hand and pulled me to my feet
i couldnt resist them i tried but i couldnt.  i went with them out the front door into this lite. i vagley remember being escorted into the ship.  when we went into the ship we were in this room a metallic room with a surgical bed with 4 aliens surrouinding my mom.  she was being examined by these people and then i noticed that this little guy was with me next to me. he was showing me this thing but i couldnt understand what it was used for.  i think i was to take a leak in it but i said noway thats nasty.  i began to notice these aliens would come through this door so when i could i made my way to thuis passageway and went through i then saw stars abouve and below me i kept walking then i came to this room a bigger room where these aliens flew the ship. there were about 9 aliens with big asian like eyes and this one alien dressed in a black robe. i started to walk around this room i saw different kinds of symbolls on different things in this room .  then the little guy came  for me and then this alien dressed in the black robe became very irate angry with me beacuse i wasnt to be there  he asked if i was a soldier i said no way im just a kid.  we then went to other parts of the ship down this long corridor there was a round table then the little guy began to explain to me how their movement was possible with no sound done with some kind of electro magnatism.  then we went to a room where ther were 2boys and 2 girls. but these kids had no expressions they were for the most part normal lookingn for kids.  the little guy told me that he wanted me to show these chioldren how to play.  i told him where some of my toys were located one a army jeep another was a horse trailer and the last was a tonka truck.  he left me with these kids and returned a short time later with my toys that i had since i was a kid.  i began to make noises like a truck rrrr.... while pushing the truck around.  then these kids began to laugh then i became scarred all these kids had sharp pointed teeth.  we then left and continued walking around the ship. he showed me where they stay in their rooms.  i asked him if i could go with them to learn and explore he then said that they wouldnt be back for 33 years but that if i wanted i could go and that i wouldnt age at all.  i thought about it but then realization set in and that i loved my mom and dad and must stay with  my parents.  after a little while we again went to the examining room but this time my mom wasnt here.  i said wheres my mom he said tha shwe was being prepaered for the returnand her mind would be erased of all memories of what had just happend to her.  i then told him that i wanted to remember all that had happend to me and our friendship.
  
i was then led to this surgical bed.  where there were three aliens checking me out one had this long tube that he began to shove into my abdoman i yelled and screamed but severe pain pursued me. they act like they dont know what pain is. i began to cry still they dont give me any thing for the pain it became so severe that i almost trey to pass out but i couldnt then this other alien came around to the back of my head and i felt as if somepthing was pushed in.  tyhen i was out.  i remember the last thing we talked about i was taken to this erase memory room of all that had happend to me i told this little guy that i wanted to have remember and he said where do you want to be taken to i said under my bed and so it was done. later i woke up underneath my bed. tryiing and recalling all that had happend to us...
content.summary: I was abducted from my bedroom closet where i was hiding. after wittnessing 3 boomering ships  above our house that made no noise.

content.detailedDescription:
My grilfriend and i were standing on our apt balcony were watching the storm comeing through. (looking toward the west.)  the clouds covered the sky and a small hole started forming, it was a small hole and perfectly circle, to perfect.  at the same time a bright light appeared to come out of the clouds toward us, (standing there stareing... wondering what were seeing...) i thought it might be the sun just beaming through it looked like it came out of the clouds with a bright trail behind it, (at that point we are kinda freaking out)it looked like it went right back the other way and dissappered! (thats what made this so weird!)  the hole that seemed like it was growing... it just dissappered and the clouds took back over that spot in the sky!  

we looked at eachother in aww, both of our hair standing on its end!
content.summary: Bright light that put a hole in the cloud and went directly away! quick!

content.detailedDescription: As i was in my room with my little brother watching tv, my uncle called me and said "look outside your gonna see ufos" i honestly thought he was lying to mess with me cause i've always been interested in this. but i went outside my front door and looked outside but i couldn't see nothing. so i called him and said where?  he told me to go to the back yard and sure enough their was about 6 lights blinking above the mountains. i was amazed at how low they seemd to the pinal mountains. i yelled out to my mom who was in the living room. and as i was doing that two of them moved away from the rest they were overlapping another. they were going pretty fast. i grabbed my cellphone and started recording them. the video did not come out to good even though i have a 5.0 megapixel camera which is really good for a phone so i started recording as i was recording towards the left of me i saw a huge red light that was speeding towards the two smaller lights. and those two lights stopped literallly stopped above the mountain imediately after that i saw a bright orange yellow light and the two smaller lights were gone the light went up . it wasnt a flare cause flares do not go up into the sky. this light was going up. (i got that on my phone) the rest of the lights were gone except for one to the right of me which was still blinking so i focused on that one also with my phone than more lights around it started to appear and in the blink of an eye it was gone. my family owns a restaurant in downtown. my dad, uncle, and cousin were the first ones to view it from the restaurant. my cousin told me that he saw a huge light and that the lights that i had seen had come from that light he also recorded it on his phone and you can see three bright lights. i don't know maybe they were jets but i don't think so cause this lights were going really fast stopped in the middle of the sky jets don't normally do that i think also we've had some air force jets train around here and they've been thosuands of feet in the air but you can still hear them and these were very low in the sky and you couldn't hear nothing. i just wanna find out what is my family and i saw.
content.summary: Speeding light (blue,orange,red)

content.detailedDescription: Its was nearing the end of 2007, i cant recall the actual date but i think it was in or around mid oct. i was at my cousin's house hanging out with him and his girlfriend. we were all in the kitchen talking and his mom said something about her bird houses, (she loves taking pic's of birds with digital cam) anyways... it was probably around 8 or 9pm and my cousins girlfriend and i were by the kitchen bay window (which faces south) looking outside at the birdhouse's and his mom pointing and explaining something about the birds she took pic's of. his mom no more than walked away from the windows when i said under my breath, "what the f*** is that." i remember my cousins girlfriend grabbing my arm her saying something but no clue on what she said (at this time my cousin is speaking to his mother).  we both ran to the sliding door opened it and stepped outside. now ever since i was a little kid i have always been fascinated with "ufos, and flying saucers" and the possibility of their existence, but that night proved it all to me!! we both look up at this thing and it was seriously the most amazing most frightening thing i have ever witnessed... now i would call it a craft but there was nothing about this object to indicate that it was a craft of any sort. there was absolutely no sound coming from this thing and no physical traits or characteristics for me to determine how close or far away it was. now, it seemed and almost felt as it were very close (if there was a way to gauge its distance like when looking at a plane in the sky and determining what type of plane it is and the shadows it casts on its self are also things to help gauge distance including clouds)but no clouds, no shadows, and i'm pretty damn sure no planes look anything like this thing. the object was in the shape of a foot ball but a little more rounded on what appeared to be the edge of this thing, and like i said it had no physical traits other than the color it was emitting. it was a dull greenish blue color and it wasn't shooting across the sky or moving very fast at all. the entire thing happened- from inside the house to watching it disappear in the distant city lit sky in about a minute or two. i have no idea what this object was, where it came from or where it was heading. i do know i shared this experience with someone i know, and i'm damn sure on what we both saw. was is an "alien space craft" not sure, but if you use those words in definition then yeah, maybe! but we will never know. i don't have physical evidence to prove what i seen that night, only the words that i write in this message. this was my experience and that's all i need for my proof.
content.summary: Small blueish green football shaped light passes over from north to south in city. i

content.detailedDescription: It was a clear night temp was around 56 no aircraft were in the area of the mountain ta the time i was sitting on the front porch with my wife when we saw a flash ing over at the mountain red in color we watched as in would flash on and off then to the left we saw five brite rede objctes lite up in a row at the crest of the mountain an stayed lit for about 3 minutes then when out then ther were flashes of other object all around the mountain crest then ther were aircraft that took off from the near by airforce base that headed toward the mountain three in all they flew around as if looking for something. i would like to know if anyone else saw what we did / please let me know thank you.
content.summary: Unknow over mountain

content.detailedDescription: It was a clear night temp was around 56 no aircraft were in the area of the mountain ta the time i was sitting on the front porch with my wife when we saw a flash ing over at the mountain red in color we watched as in would flash on and off then to the left we saw five brite rede objctes lite up in a row at the crest of the mountain an stayed lit for about 3 minutes then when out then ther were flashes of other object all around the mountain crest then ther were aircraft that took off from the near by airforce base that headed toward the mountain three in all they flew around as if looking for something. i would like to know if anyone else saw what we did / please let me know thank you.
content.summary: Unknow over mountain.

content.detailedDescription: First, i attend airventure at osh every year since 1987 & stay at same campground, circle "r". the airport is closed after 9 pm every day. i am a pilot and an architect. my friends and i observed these lights on 3 evenings that summer, i think it was sun, tues and wed during the last week of july. clear, slightly hazy sky. linear rows of bright lights appeared in western sky and stayed lit for about one to three minutes each. sometimes more than one row at a time. the rows of lights were usually horizontal, several were ascending or decending on angle of up to 20 deg. lights were stationary and came on suddenly, then off suddenly. the area where they appeared was from 260 degrees to 280 degrees and angle above ground from 10 degrees to 30 degrees. visibility at the time was probably 10 to 15 miles. i know there is an ang base to the west about 80 miles, near tomah, wi, that would be too far away to observe anything, but i don't know where their training moa is. also this is the 1st time we have seen this, so not a normal routine apparently. our thought is that it may have been some form of stationary flares ejected from training aircraft, but they would have to have been fairly close, 10-30 degree angle above horizon is a lot of airspace in a short period of time if further away than 3 to 5 miles is our guess, and we heard nothing. 2009 was cloudy or mostly cloudy every night that same week in july so we saw nothing repeated. we cautiously metioned this to a few others attending airventure - noone else was either looking westerly or view was obscured by trees, we also checked the bulletin boards including the one at faa building for any explanations. we still discuss this event occasionally when we are together, still very curious. we would sure like to know if there is a good explanation of what we observed. we don't know if lines of lights which were regularly spaced as each one a very large cigar type or edge of disks - or if they were multiple vehicles in linear formation.
content.summary: Multiple occurances of linear series of lights in different parts of western sky

content.detailedDescription:
While working in the yard my wife saw a metallic glint when the vessel was first sighted in the nne coming from the general direction of parley's canyon.  it had an estimated altitude of ~9-10,500 feet using mount olympus (9,026 ft.) as a reference point.  it moved at a constant speed of ~80-100 mph and made no sound.  the object traversed at a steady speed from the nne, veering slightly and crossing in front of mount olympus and heading ssw toward sandy.  we lost sight of it as it moved far enough away that it was no longer visible as it was blocked by our garage roof.  

at first glance i thought it was a commercial aircraft because the way it was reflecting light it was hard to see the object clearly and i didn't have my glasses on.  my wife first thought it might be a paraglider as we see them often circling in front of mount olympus, but it quickly became apparent that this wasn't the case.

it was moving fairly quickly but we were able to grab binoculars used for birdwatching inside the door and were able to see it quite clearly with the binoculars.  it was a long (~150-200 ft.), fairly thin (~30-35 ft. diameter in the middle) metallic cigar with small fins on the rear and visible orange and yellow flames behind the fins.  it looked like a large rocket lying horizontally.  this was not a winged craft.  there were no wings and no visible means of keeping the craft aloft.  the flames seemed to be some kind of propulsion.

it looked blimp-like, but didn't appear to be a balloon and the way it reflected it was either solid metal or had a metallic skin.  we were unable to see any other features besides the "rear" fins on the craft, just a smooth, shiny metallic sheen.

it looked almost identical to an object seen on 6-13-2007 in salt lake city.  although that object didn't have visible flames, was flying much lower and had features on the bottom that we didn't (or couldn't) see.  i will attach a photo of that object as it is very similar to what we saw.  videos of that object are readily available on the internet.

this isn't our first sighting of a ufo so our reaction was mostly to see as much of the craft as possible and note details.  i remember that we both noted that it was silent and we couldn't understand why it didn't just drop like a rock as it had no apparent lift and the flames in the back seemed to be only to make it move forward, or possibly for directional control.  it was a large metallic object apparently levitating.  

it always seems to cause cognitive dissonance to see a ufo as it raises so many complex existential questions.  and it also raises the question as to why they are seen constantly yet the government ignores and denies their existence vehemently.
content.summary: Large metallic, cigar shaped object with small rocket-like fins on rear and visible flames.

content.detailedDescription:
i have sent this email to several ufologists that i watched  on  the ancient aliens series. so far no one has responded.   i seriously believe that an abduction occurred on the night we witnessed this spectacular landing.  perhaps you know someone in my area that i could speak with about this incident.  dr. friedman was kind enough to send me name of someone in this area in 2009 i did received an email from that person giving me a phone number.  after calling and leaving several messages and not getting a response i stop pursuing the matter.  however, there is not too many days that i don't think about this sighting more than 60 years ago.  
 
i realize that you are an extremely busy man.  however,  if you know anyone in the st. louis, mo area that could help me understand why it took more then 30 years to remember a mesmerizing sighting my mother, grandfather and i witnessed when i was around 7 years of age i would appreciate the help. here is what happened. we lived on a plantation in  greenville mississippi.  my father, grandmother and  sister had gone into the city to do the weekly shopping for groceries. my mother and i went outside to gather firewood for the fireplace as we walked off the porch into the front yard we observed a huge red ball of fire coming out of the sky and my mother exclaimed, "oh my god the world must be coming to and end".  all of a sudden the fire goes out and we saw huge ship with various lights, red, yellow and i believe green.  my mother yelled for my grandfather who came out onto the porch and was unable to speak just stare.  it lit up the area as if it was daylight.  at the time we did not have electricity and used lamps for light.  we actually saw people standing in the windows that was beneath the dome.  the ship landed and that is all we remember.  we do not recall it leaving, we do not recall ever talking to anyone about it.  i find that very strange and have not been able to get it out of my mind.  if you could refer me to someone in this area that i can speak to.  i am now 68 years of age and am considering being regressed to re-live this experience.  i seek no publicity only some kind of understanding as to what happened along with other strange occurrences on this plantation. 
 
thanks so much.
 
andrew
content.summary: First appeared as a large red fireball decending slowing from the sky and the fire went out and a huge round ship with a dome and various colored flashing lights.  windows below the dome area.

content.detailedDescription: The sighting occured at loop g on assateague island state park campground. the sky was cloudless and deep blue, with a steady 8-10 mph wind from the south. i had just set up camp and was getting organized while i waited for my wife and son to join me from glen burnie, md. i noticed some colorful kites aloft in neighboring camp loops and watched them for a while. i glanced out to the dunes facing east listening to the constant crash of the waves, when i noticed the object in the ne sky, out over the shoreline. my first impression was that someone was flying a kite on the beach, but that thought quickly ended when i sensed the object moving slowly southward, against the wind. i grabbed my ww2 7x50 field glasses from the truck and examined the object noting immediately that it was slightly curved with both ends facing the atlantic. it reminded me of a dark gray crayon with a blunt end. at this time i became aware that the thing became straight looking exactly like a crayon, then amazingly reversing it's curve, while still moving southward, always keeping the same end more or less in the same direction. well, after 4-5 minutes of not identifying this anomaly, i strutted across the loop to the nearest campsite and approached a gentleman talking to his wife, and with a fast introduction handed my binoculars to glen, from new jersey, asking him to take a gander at this thing in the sky. after a moment he was also astounded to witness such an unrecognizable whateveritwas. we watched it together for a spell and i returned to my site. now the crayon was directly east, easily viewable by ayone looking to the ocean, and very explicit and vivid with my trusty glasses. sometimes the bright sun glinted off the leading portion and side of this thing. i tried to photograph it but my camera was inadequate, and later saw the object very small in the pictures. estimated altitude at the closest point was 4-5000 feet...Very approximate as there was nothing to compare it to, moving 20-30 mph maybe. it was in site for 30 minutes and finally continued southward, and got higher until i couldn't see any longer. what a great day it was! with all of my worldly experience not being able to identify something i could see so clearly left me bemused. wow...That's all folks.
content.summary: Long dark gray cigar shaped object, rounded at both ends.

content.detailedDescription: I was returning from virginia traveling south on i-85 sunday, oct 11, 2009, about 9 am, on a clear, sunny day...Few clouds. i saw an object ahead of me appearing at first to be a narrow portion of a cloud, but quickly realized it was not a cloud. it was approximately 1-1/2 miles ahead and passing very slowly over the interstate highway, from the east toward the west or wnw. it appeared gray, almost opaque, but had a "shimmering" appearance. at first i considered it to be some type of advertisement pulled by an airplane but it was so very long i quickly dismissed that, also. marking it by other structures i slowed down (traffic, though not heavy, was 75 mph at that point)...When i could finally get to a clear spot (each side of 85 are obstructed by high banks and pine trees) i could view the object from behind and beneath it...Now appearing pitch black, surfboard shaped with a tapered tail and small winglike projections from the sides at the middle. it took awhile to get past it and i really could not get a clear view for very long. however, judging the altitude (about 200- 300 feet off the ground) and time it took to pass, i felt as if it was simply moving very slowly or floating. because of the area involved (swamp and wood lands) i was unable to visualize it for very long. i guess it moved across the highway at about 20-25 mph and would have to guess the whole object was about 200-300 yards long and about 75 yards wide.It was certainly something that i have never seen before..I have seen other aircraft including the stealth bomber and this object was none of those. i have never witnessed a ufo before and delayed reporting this because i didn't know how. i am a physician and was alone in the car. after talking with our sc state mufon director, she encouraged me to report the incident. she was also helpful in assuring me i was not crazy!!!
content.summary: "surfboard" shaped, opaque or gray from side, black from underneath with small semicircular "wing like" projections from middle sides, shimmering appearance from side, tail tapered to point as viewed from beneath.

content.detailedDescription:
Witness was driving northwest on highway 273 towards weston, mo and noticed a shiny object to the west of him over the missouri river.  as he got closer he could make out a silver disk-shaped object that was moving slowly from a south-north direction.  he called his wife to get a number of someone to call and got my number off of the momufon website.  he estimated the object to be 1/2 - 1 mile away from him, at 40 degrees off the horizon and very large.  it did not change direction or speed.  witness said he would call me back after he got home but had not done so yet.  

note: there are other recent sightings in this area.  weston is just across the mo river and ft. leavenworth is on the other side.
content.summary: Silver disk over missouri river

content.detailedDescription: St.Albans vermont.. i had just got done watching the history channels "ancient aliens".. (i love this stuff) and i thought my mom was joking when she ran into my room and said "you wanna see a ufo" and walked away.. i laughed and thought she heard me watching that show but i got up and followed her to our front door of the house. she pointed across the street to the left of out neighbors house and to the left of a big oak tree.. this is what i saw.. a star-like object in the sky but seemed to be alot closer than a star and it was flashing different colors from  blue to red mostly but but white too and sometimes a "flash" of yellow that made the object double in size.. it seemed as if the lights were rotating in a circular motion because the blue and red were almost non-stop. the object would slighty move in the sky because we were not moving from our spot on the patio and the object would get behind the big branches of the oak tree without us moving at all. the object slighty went right and then it would rise slightly and after a couple minutes it would go back a little left and get outta of the way of oak tree in clear sight again.. my mom and girlfriend both bored of staring at the object for 10-20min. both went inside. i walked off my patio and closer to the object and noticed a blue star-like object zoom right over the top of the main object.. the blue star-like object that zoomed over it did not stop briefly or stand still it just zoomed over the top and went right by. i ran inside and told my mom i thought a plane went over the "ufo".. my mom and i went back to our spot on the front patio and after 5 minutes or so of watching the object we both saw out of the eastern sky  what we thought at first was a plane come from the direction of plattsburgh new york and headed straight for the "ufo". it flew over the top of the "ufo" and was blinking a red light at the front a green light in the middle and a red light at the back thats why i thought it was a plane..But no longer then 15-30 seconds went by and coming from the western sky and no more then 2-300 yards above our house a 2nd helicopter (i call it 2nd because it was doing the same exact thing the first what i had thought to be a plane object was doing) flew directly over our house and was flashing a red light on front, green light in the middle, and red light at the back.. the 2nd helicopter went towards the exact direction the 1st plane/helicopter had started from.. the 2 helicopters seemed to be making a perfect circle around the "ufo" and at this point my mom seemed frightened a little and said " what the f*** is going on around here".. the helicopters went out of sight and i watched the object for 5 minutes and went inside to get some water because it was still 90 degrees out.. i went back outside with my girlfriend 5-10 minutes later and the object was gone! i was very mad it was gone because i wanted to see it when it/if it went away.. we got in the car and started to drive towards where the object was but it was not in the night sky anymore. i was quite upset and went back home. i am still quite excited with what seems to be my first sighting.. i also pulled my iphone out and recorded (mostly by voice) what i was seeing at the time.
content.summary: Blue, red, white, and yellow flashing star-like object in sky. helicopters seem to invesitgate the object.

content.detailedDescription:
My cousin and i were using my 6" newtonian telescope in the backyard at about 11:36pm mst while chatting i was pointing out a star to the left of polaris. (the north star) we were looking northwesterly at this point. i turned to adjust my telescope and when i turned back around i briefly glanced around the same spot i was looking before. i noticed immediately a fairly bright in magnitude light that was moving. it seemed to be about magnitude -3 or thereabouts. (my cousin having never looked away was staring at the light dumbfounded at this point. which seemed strange to me upon later recollection as i would have expected him to mention it right away.) 

my first impression was this must be a helicopter way in the distance coming toward us. i stated this to my cousin as well out loud. as the very last word of the sentence left my mouth the light became much brighter in magnitude up to i would say a -5 at the peak of it. about 7 seconds had passed at this point since i had first glimpsed the light. as it peaked the light which i could see some discernable shapes in between the light gaps on it disapeared and i saw a cigar shaped object depart from the middle of the light and head north at a very high rate of speed. i could make out the object for about 3 seconds as it dimmed and then dispeared northbound. 

the bright light immediately vanished as soon as the cigar shaped object emerged. this was all fairly hard to make out at such a distance. my cousin describes pretty much the same story except he had it in visual range for about 3 seconds longer than i did while adjusting my telescope. if i hadn't looked up when i did i would have missed it and he would have been describing it to me. for obvious reasons i have kept my contact info fairly short but would be happy to talk about this in further detail at some point. please contact by email.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Bright light moving fast above treeline flashed brighter and saw a cigar shaped object fly north from point of flash. seemed at edge of space.

content.detailedDescription: Ok there was a mysterious object ufo which started the anti-aircraft artilery off at aprox 3am. now the pciture that is shown like on the history channel on may 26, 2010 is very bright and blurry. i have a copy of the picture i have enclosed for you to see. now you will notice you can barley make out the subject with the bright spotting lights are beamed on. now i took the picture and used a program on my laptop and did some adjusting of tint, hue, saturation and shadows and was able to pull a image out and i will leave it to you to see what you see and tell me its not what we all think? very interesting and the photos are are doctored and are still on my laptop and can show how the image was pulled out to what you see. i have enclosed untouch picture and the one i did and you can see what you see. you are free to contact me anytime for any questions, but lets look into this because this shows once again the government is pushing aside and hiding..............
content.summary: Battle of los angeles 1942 ufo

content.detailedDescription: My friends and i were sitting outside behind an apartment complex at nw okc, the closest intersection being wilshire & council road. this part of the city is on the border of oklahoman county & canadian county. as we were just enjoying the evening, we saw a sudden concentrated flash that was seen in my peripheral vision. as soon as i looked up, i saw a very faint, and very small (as being far away?) follow and suddenly disappear into space. i had no idea what to think as what it was because it happened in a matter of seconds. one of my friends that i was with saw exactly what i did, but the other two who were facing the other direction just saw the flash. it was not a big one that covered the sky, but it was about how big a camera flash is, just up in the air and farther away. from where i was sitting and where it was, it more than likely happened over canadian county. i have never seen anything like this before in my life and my friend who saw it agreed with me. we have no idea what it was and it was just very peculiar.
content.summary: Sudden flash, then faint trail following into space - all in a matter of seconds

content.detailedDescription: I had went out to turn on the water for the sprinkler system when i noticed a helicopter or small airplane travling north to south. just as the aircraft went behind the house next door roof line i noticed a faint light fadeing in and out(blinking). i thought it was a star or high fling aircraft. in a second or two another light appeared. they jumped from point to point like they were playing. the blinking was not consistant, sometimes the blink was fast and sometimes it was longer. at one point they went out and a few seconds later appeared in another point in the sky. after a few more game playing they moved back to a point close to where i had first seewn them. they played maybe 15 to 30 seconds and disappered. i ran in the house to get my cameras while my freing watched them and pointed the camcorder in their direction but was unable to set the view finder on them. i kind of believed there were such things in the sky but at almost 64 this is the first time i have seen something, now i  am a beliver.
content.summary: 2 blinking lights were playing (thats the closest thing i can think of)

content.detailedDescription: My wife went to the pool around 9 pm. at 907pm she called me from the pool and i colud not understand what she was saying at first because the phone was making a weird whooping sound. i then heard her say ufo and i rushed out to the pool. there it was, the ufo i reported on cinco de mayo. i could see it perfectly clear this time. my wife and i began to take video with our camera phones. i told her to go get her actual camera for better video. she went and got it and we began to take regular video of it flying all around for about 5 minutes. then it swooped down out of site on the other side of the apartment. we assumed it landed. i waited for a minute to see if it would come back and then decided to run to the other side of the building to try and see it. that was what i did when i lost sight of it on the 5th but this time it was still there. i took a few pics and shot around another four or five minutes of video of it. there was a small crowd of other people across the street who had pulled over the watch it. it flew in an acrobatic style as if putting on a show still around 500 ft in the air like last time. but this time it went up to around 1000ft and would swoop down to 500ft. it made no sound. it would hit a few hundred miles per hour every now and then. it flew around a the same 3 or 4 mile radius for about 25 minutes. then it was gone. got great footage of it swooping at high speeds then doing an instant change in direction. when i saw it on the 5th i was unable to see it clearly and thought it was a triangle but it seemed to be a t shape as far as i could tell. last time through the tree i was only able to see four blue lights and this time i could see 8 blue lights and a tiny red one in the middle. it had to be what messed up my wifes initial phone call. when i took two of the pictures it seemed to blink in response. that seems to be the whole thing.
content.summary: Ufo returned and flew in circles and back and forth.

content.detailedDescription: Over northern fl at fl 380 my first officer pointed out 2 lights circling each other at about our 10 o'clock position. i observed the lights circling at about 10 rpm relative to each other for about 20 seconds and then saw one of the lights turn red and disappear to the northwest. the second light came toward the aircraft still at our 10 o'clock position and stopped directly over my left window. after about 10 seconds the object turned red, went straight up and disappeared from sight after about 4 seconds. it is impossible for me to estimate a size or initial altitude of the object due to the lack of any reference points.  very cool though.
content.summary: 2 objects circling each other.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed that someone else reported seeing this on the same day, so i thought i'd confirm. not really sure what it was. although it was much brighter than anything else in the sky, i guess it could have been that recently launched space-plane. anyway, i was night fishing on truman lake when i saw it. approximately 9:30pm. i didn't think too much of it, except that it was very bright. looking to the north at about 60degrees from horizontal, and several miles away. yes, it was very humid that night. in fact, my boat and everything it was soaking with dew. it was very bright for a few seconds, then went dim. not sure where it went.
content.summary: Very bright light. brighter than planes. dimmed, bright, dim. no plane lights.

content.detailedDescription: I was having a rough day, piecing together a personal conspiracy puzzle -- waking up out of a government/interdimensional being conspiracy.  i go out in my car with my dog at night, headed south toward the park, driving on a city road with many other cars around.  i notice a light in the southern sky, as bright as a planet like venus, and think, that's weird for a planet to be there.  continue to drive, look up again, and this bright light has two blinking lights on the sides of it, like airplane lights, and as i'm looking at it, the middle light turns off, and now it looks like any airplane at night, flying north, but right above the area where i was driving. i did a "what the hell?" and my head was tingling just a bit after that.  considering what i've discovered about technology recently, i will go out and say it: it must have been a mind reading device, or a thought implanting device, that caused the tingling.  the ufo went past my view, me going south, it going north, and i went home after seeing that.  i'm surprised something like this would happen considering all the very disturbing things i'm discovering these past couple days.
content.summary: Planet in the southern sky that turned on plane lights and moved north, then turned off central light.

content.detailedDescription: approximately one month before i saw a bright light go past my backyard window and in my kitchen. i grabbed my camera and recorded what looks to be two dark gray creatures in my kitchen. then went out back and filmed two different ufo,s. after examining the tape i was freaked did not want to believe what i saw. and still my biggest question is why me! so last saturday i went back outside with my camera and captured three different type crafts. the first is a futuristic looking plane it would fly within 10 feet of me. the second was a ring looking craft with a single bright light moving fast and go to a sudden halt looked to be starring me down,then a disk "saucer" shaped shot from the right to the left faster than a speeding bullet. it sounded similar to a fighter jet, which i have also recorded. i would appreciate contact by phone, not e-mail. i would really like a response asap and thank you for your time.
content.distance: 20 Feet or Less, 21-100 Feet, 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile
content.features: Dome,  Patterned Surface,  Appendage(s),  Louvres,  Wings,  Other
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I saw three different types of ufo,s i have them all on video.

content.detailedDescription:
Tonight at 9:35 pm, may 25th 2010, i just witnessed almost the same object again in color and illumination. this time it was a dim white light traveling from a north to south line. when directly overhead the intensity of the light grew as bright as the iss does and then slowly dimmed out again as it was when i first started watching opposed the flash i saw with ther object from a few days ago. the total time of the visible object was around 30 seconds. i could see the extreme humidity outside was very thick and can only see 1 or 2 visible stars. after checking the iss flyovers of st.Louis, there are no orbital paths flying over here until june so it wasn't an iss flyover or a satellite, because satellites always give off a reddish hue due to the infrared light reflected back off the earth. again it was a bright white object started out as a dim light then in the middle of path grew extremely bright as the iss is and then slowly dimmed out with a speed about as fast as the iss flyovers are from what i can reference. there were no faa lights, just one solid white light, nothing blinking or flashing. no other planes in the sky before or after event. 
 following points answers: i went outside in my frontyard as i do all the time to smoke, don't smoke in my house, i always look up everytime at night at first i thought the dim light was a satellite for the first few seconds until the illumination grew extremely bright for about 6-10 seconds before slowly dimming out again. shuttle or iss doesn't seem to do this on the 10 flyovers i've seen. it's path was from almost due north to due south. i lost sight of the object after the light dimmed, but did not dim out was still visible but the humidity was very heavy here tonight in creve coeur (st.Louis county. (*one thing i can not account for this time is that possibly it may have been the usaf x37b)
content.summary: bright white light, dim to bright to dim in illumination
